''' Hello and Welcome '''

== SVAKSHA ==

I dont maintain this wiki-page regularly. An updated Bio is maintained here: http://svaksha.com/pages/Bio

An Ubuntu volunteer since Warty and an ex-Ubuntu member (2006aug22 - 2008) who currently volunteers at <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com|Ubuntu]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-women.org|Ubuntu-Women]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://women.alioth.debian.org/|Debian-Women]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://women.kde.org/|KDE-Women]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.linuxchix.org|Linuxchix]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.linuxchix.org,in|IndiChix]]</nowiki>- the Indian chapter.

=== Libre software projects i volunteer in: ===

==== LinuxChix.org ====

* Admins the <nowiki>[[http://linuxchix.org/mailman/listinfo/newchix|Newchix]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://linuxchix.org/mailman/listinfo/jobposts|Job-posts]]</nowiki> mailing lists for <nowiki>[[http://www.linuxchix.org|LinuxChix]]</nowiki>, an online community for women "using" Linux.
* Admins the <nowiki>[[http://linuxchix.org/mailman/listinfo/indichix|Indichix]]</nowiki> (Indian) list.

==== KDE-women ====

* Admins the <nowiki>[[https://mail.kde.org/mailman/listinfo/kde-women|KDE-Women mailing list]]</nowiki>.

==== Ubuntu-Women ====

 {*} Founded <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-women.org|Ubuntu-Women]]</nowiki> - <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/ubuntu-women|Launchpad]]</nowiki>

* Designed, created, wrote and implemented the contents for static and wiki pages for the new website while migrating from the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuWomen|old wiki page]]</nowiki>.

* Maintains the website and admins the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-women|UW mailing list]]</nowiki>.

* Co-ordinates the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-women.org/mentoring.html|mentoring]]</nowiki> project with <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/ElizabethKrumbach|Elizabeth Krumbach]]</nowiki> and guides new users on how to contribute to Ubuntu. Also wrote the <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/MentoringFAQ|Mentoring FAQ]]</nowiki>, IRC guidelines, and many other <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/FrontPage|U-W Wiki]]</nowiki> pages.
